meanings.definition: The act of going out with someone in whom one is romantically or sexually interested.
meanings.sent1: Her parents were not happy about her dating a boy from school.
meanings.sent2: Online dating has become very popular in recent years.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat was dating the neighbor's dog.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, mixing patterns is like dating - it's all about finding the right match.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the ups and downs of dating in a humorous way.

meanings.definition: The setting of a date on a calendar.
meanings.sent1: Don't forget to mark the dating of the meeting on your calendar.
meanings.sent2: The dating of important events helps in planning ahead.
meanings.sent3: The dating of her birthday party clashed with his graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The dating of the deadline for the project was crucial for its successful completion.
meanings.sent5: The dating of holidays varies from country to country.

meanings.definition: The estimation of the age of an artifact, biological vestige, linguistic usage, etc.
meanings.sent1: Carbon dating is used to determine the age of fossils.
meanings.sent2: The dating of ancient pottery can be challenging due to various factors.
meanings.sent3: The dating of the old manuscript revealed it was from the 15th century.
meanings.sent4: The dating of the rock layers helped scientists understand the Earth's history.
meanings.sent5: The dating of the artifact confirmed its authenticity.
